comments.body: Why not use [`--test_tag_filters`](https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/command-line-reference.html#flag--test_tag_filters) on the `head-quick` tag?
hm is that nicer? The docs for `test_suite` sounded like the `tags` feature is intended for exactly this kind of usecase (they use a set of small tags).

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+#!/usr/bin/env bash
+# Copyright (c) 2020 Digital Asset (Switzerland) GmbH and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
+
+
+# Build the release artifacts required for running the compatibility
+# tests against HEAD. At the moment this includes the SDK release tarball
+# and the ledger-api-test-tool fat JAR.
+
+set -eou pipefail
+
+cd "$(dirname "$0")"
+
+eval "$(../dev-env/bin/dade-assist)"
+
+bazel build //...
+if [ "${1:-}" = "--quick" ]; then
+    bazel test //:head-quick
+else
+    bazel test //...
+fi
